document_data.name: Flaying
document_data.mainbody: '''''Flaying''''' was a gruesome [[spell]] from the [[necromancy]] school of magic, used by [[arcane]] spellcasters as well as by [[Dreadmaster]]s of [[Bane]].
document_data.Effects: ''Flaying'' could be cast on any creature within the caster's eyesight, and the target had a chance of resisting its effects. The affected creature had their skin and flesh peeled from their bodies in steps, leaving the wounds magically open and bleeding and the targets vulnerable to blood loss and infection.
